Chinese Definition:
①蚯蚓。
②鳝鱼：“蟹六跪而二螯，非蛇蟺之穴无可寄托者。”
③蜕变；变迁：“形气转续兮，变化而蟺。”
Chinese Definition:
Hanzi: 蟮

蟺字的基本解释

蟺
shàn
蚯蚓。
鳝鱼：“蟹六跪而二螯，非蛇蟺之穴无可寄托者。”
蜕变；变迁：“形气转续兮，变化而蟺。”

蟺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shàn］
［《廣韻》常演切，上獮，禪。］
(1)见“蜿2蟺”。
(2)通“鱔”、“鱓”。
[②]［chán］
［《集韻》時連切，平，禪。］
通“蟬1”。
[③]［tuó］
［《集韻》唐何切，平戈，定。］
鼍龙。
[④]［dàn］
［《集韻》徒案切，去换，定。］
见“蟺4蜂”。

蟺字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蟺； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1099第02
【唐韻】常演切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】上演切，?音善。【說文】䖤蟺也。【玉篇】蚯蚓也。【嵆康·琴賦】䖤蟺相糾。見䖤字註。　又【集韻】時連切，音禪。同蟬。【賈誼·鵩賦】形氣轉續兮，變化而蟺。　又徒案切，音憚。土蠭名。【本草】土蜂，巴楚閒呼爲蟺蜂。　又【類篇】唐何切。與鼉、鱓通。水蟲，似蜥蜴。

蟺字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蟺字的起名意思

暂无。

蟺
Basic explanation of words
蟺
shàn
earthworm.
Eel: "Crab has six knees and two claws, and there is no place to trust in non-snake holes."
Transformation; change: "The form and energy will continue to change, but the change will be fascinating."
蟺
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shàn］
["Guangyun" often plays and cuts, goes up and down, and Zen. ]
(1) See "Winding 2 蟺".
(2) Through "eel" and "鱓".
[②]［chán］
["Jiyun" is continuous cutting, flat , Zen. ]
Link "Cicada 1".
[③]［tuó］
["Ji Yun" Tang Heqie, Ping Ge, Ding. ]
Thunder dragon.
[④]［dàn］
["Ji Yun" cut the case, change and decide. ]
See "Four Bees".
蟺
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蟺; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1099 Page 02
[Tang Yun] often perform cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] stage cut, good sound. [Said the text] You are also. 【Jade articles】Earthworms too. 【Zhengkang·Qin Fu】Complaint to each other. See 薤 word note.　 [Ji Yun] Shi Lian Qi, Yin Zen. The same cicada. [Jia Yi·Fu] The form and energy continue to change, and the change is fascinating.　The case is cut again, and the sound is shocked. The name of the earthworm. [Materia Medica] Bumblebee, Bachu idlely called the bee.　[Classes] Tang Heqie. Communicate with Wei and Wei. Water worm, like a lizard.
